summary: A suite of unit tests that validate the functionality of the neural‑network ensemble backend in the Annif library, covering initialization (including parallel mode), parameter defaults, learning‑rate configuration, training behavior, suggestion generation, handling of missing models, caching mechanisms, modification timestamps, and LMDB map‑size settings.
business_intent: To guarantee that the nn_ensemble backend reliably supports model training, inference, configuration, and error handling, ensuring stable operation within the Annif automated indexing system.
